Swirling down from misty peaks and through howling mountain passes like an evil wind, the vortex of bones known as a skulltaker is a terrible manifestation of the delirium and agony experienced by doomed climbers and lost trailblazers just before they met their end. In some places, a skulltaker is also known as a saxra. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Skulltaker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3198) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 314 1.1 **Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); Skeletal Lore languages **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30, [Skeletal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +32 **Str** +8 **Dex** +6 **Con** +6 **Int** +2 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +7 **Skeletal Lore** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) A skulltaker taps into the memories of the creatures whose bones make up its body. This gives it the Skeletal Lore skill, which it can use to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) of any kind. In addition, it can speak and understand all the languages known by the creatures whose bones make up its body (typically including [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=155) and the regional language of the skulltaker's home region). The skulltaker can use Skeletal Lore as the primary skill check for the [_collective memories_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=113) ritual, and it can cast _collective memories_ without secondary casters. --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +31 **Ref** +33 **Will** +35 +1 status to all saves vs. [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) **HP** 300 ([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83)) **Immunities** bleed, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) **Resistances** piercing 15, slashing 15 **Shard Storm** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=527), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) 10 feet. A cloud of bone shards surrounds the skulltaker. When a creature moves into the emanation or begins its turn there, shard storm deals 4d6 slashing damage and 4d6 void damage to the creature, with a DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.
If the creature has resistance or immunity to void damage, or an effect that protects it against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, or an effect that protects it against the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67) or [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) condition, the creature must first succeed at a DC 40 Will save or have all such benefits suppressed for 1 minute. --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 60 feet **Melee** jaws +35 ([deadly 2d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+14 piercing plus 3d6 void and vitality drain **Melee** claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly 2d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d6+14 slashing plus 3d6 void and vitality drain **Ranged** bone javelin +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d8+6 piercing plus 3d6 void **Divine Innate Spells** DC 40 - **8th** [Desiccate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1484) (×2), [Execute](/Spells.aspx?ID=1519) (×2), [Punishing Winds](/Spells.aspx?ID=240) (×2) - **Constant (6th)** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Rituals** DC 40 - **7th** [Collective Memories](/Rituals.aspx?ID=113) (see Skeletal Lore) **Bonetaker** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) Whenever a creature dies within 60 feet of a skulltaker, the skulltaker draws a portion of the creature's bones into its shard storm. The creature must succeed at a DC 40 Will save or rise as a [skeletal champion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3194) in 1d4 rounds. These skeletal champions are controlled by the skulltaker. **Splintered Ground** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The skulltaker causes splintered bones to erupt from all solid surfaces in a 100-foot emanation, except for surfaces of worked stone. A creature moving through the bones takes 10 piercing damage and 10 void damage for every 5 feet of movement. The first time each round a creature takes piercing damage from these splintered bones, it must succeed at a DC 40 Reflex save or take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 10 minutes, or a –15-foot circumstance penalty for 24 hours on a critical failure. The bones remain in place until the skulltaker uses this action again or the bones are manually removed, which takes 10 minutes for each 5-foot square. **Vitality Drain** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) When a skulltaker hits with a melee Strike, the target must succeed at a DC 40 Fortitude save or become [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) and [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67).
Skulltaker Insight The cooperation of a skulltaker is a powerful asset, for this whirling mass of death retains the collective memories of the creatures whose bones form its body. Because mountain travelers come from far and wide, a skulltaker's knowledge is often vast, spanning a range of topics.
